Articles.Content: It would be great if there were some modern day one man/two man command pods, like the ones that the Iranians and ISRO are working on. The only one/two-man command pods available are all replicas of either the Mercury or Gemini capsules, and the only modern capsules available are all 3-7 man. Is anyone aware of a mod that has either one or two man modern capsules?

Here's a stockalike 2-kerbal pod based on Gemini...I think Tantares has recently produces something around this as well (sorry, can't find THAT link right now)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104925-0-90-K2-Command-Pod-Two-Kerbal-stock-alike-pod

Is anyone aware of a mod that has either one or two man modern capsules?

Nerteas Near Future Spacecraft pack has pod for two with some nice big RPMs.

ok, just found this pod in the Addon Development folder:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98250-WIP-Parts-2-Kerbal-Command-Pod-Mk-1-1-A2-%28Alpha-0-36%29
